description:
This plugin allows you to replace the default blank value of Dropdowns. With this plugin, you can easily set a custom blank option for Dropdowns, providing a better user experience for your applications.

Instructions:
- Expose the option to add an ID attribute to HTML elements (Settings - General)
- Enter the IDs of the Dropdowns you want to customize, separated by commas if there are multiple Dropdowns.
- Enter the text for the custom blank option you want to display in the Dropdowns.*

*If you want to use the same custom blank option for multiple Dropdowns, enter the text once.
*If you want to use different custom blank options for each Dropdown, enter them separated by commas.


Demo page: 
https://plugins-playground-23187.bubbleapps.io/version-test/dd_custom_blank_option
